_comment: Network master configuration - Put this file ONLY on the Pi with the USB keyboard
_instructions: Set 'enabled: true' on the Pi that has the USB keyboard connected
Set 'enabled: false' (or delete this file) on all other Pis
The keyboard can be on ANY station - it doesn't have to be station 02
Keyboard keys: V (start/stop toggle), C (standby), Ctrl (clear alarm)
